meta.sampleQuery: select * from auth.oauth.access_token where oauth_version="1.0" and oauth_signature_method="HMAC-SHA1" and oauth_consumer_key="a90dd5cb7136513d" and get_access_token_url="http://oauth-sandbox.sevengoslings.net/access_token" and consumer_secret="0e5ab8a0d69451a8a8d58d1b6d8c" and oauth_token="a2c439d89de274d3" and token_secret="c05368a3ad0f26db16fb0f820249" and oauth_verifier="9e7ade813a3089a5";
